code: export var GroupActionTypes={GET_DETAIL:"GET_DETAIL",GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS:"GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS",GET_DETAIL_ERROR:"GET_DETAIL_ERROR",CLEAR_DETAIL:"CLEAR_DETAIL",CLEAR_STATE:"CLEAR_STATE"};Object.keys(GroupActionTypes).forEach(function(key){GroupActionTypes[key]="GROUP_".concat(GroupActionTypes[key]);});var onClearDetail=function onClearDetail(){return{type:GroupActionTypes.CLEAR_DETAIL};};var onClearState=function onClearState(){return{type:GroupActionTypes.CLEAR_STATE};};var onGetDetail=function onGetDetail(id){return{type:GroupActionTypes.GET_DETAIL,id:id};};var onGetDetailSuccess=function onGetDetailSuccess(payload){return{type:GroupActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetDetailError=function onGetDetailError(error){return{type:GroupActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_ERROR,payload:error};};var GroupActions={onClearDetail:onClearDetail,onClearState:onClearState,onGetDetail:onGetDetail,onGetDetailSuccess:onGetDetailSuccess,onGetDetailError:onGetDetailError};export default GroupActions;
